location.physicalLocation: British Library: India Office Records and Private Papers

titleInfo.title: Letter from Ephraim Gerrish Stannus, Resident in the Gulf of Persia, Bushire to Captain Mitchell, Commander of the Sultan

mods.abstract: The letter is enclosing copies of two circulars (not present) and drawing the captain's attention to orders issued by William Bruce, dated 12 September 1816, concerning the forwarding of copies of cargo manifests to the Resident.
